alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:06AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Payette, southwestern Washington and northeastern Malheur Counties through 645 AM MDT... At 606 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brosman Mountain, or 14 miles west of Weiser, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moores Hollow around 610 AM MDT. Indian Head Mountain around 620 AM MDT. Weiser and Annex around 630 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; West Central Mountains
